feat.value: Continuation of the text in MONB.XJ 49-52. Parallel to MONB.GL 45-53 (not yet published by Coptic SCRIPTORIUM). A lacuna of 2 pages (1 folio) follows before the next witness published by Coptic SCRIPTORIUM. MONB.GL 53 1.8-54 2.13 contains text parallel to the XJ lacuna. This GL 53-54 parallel witness has not been published by Coptic SCRIPTORIUM.
